markdown:
The club's membership structure includes various categories with specific initiation fees, transfer scenarios, and payment requirements. 

I. MEMBERSHIP CATEGORIES & INITIATION FEES:
- New Member: Initiation fee required unless waived by the Board [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- Foundation (Legacy) Membership: Transfer fee equal to the initiation fee upon approval for children [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- Golfing Senior Membership [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- Social Membership [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- Social Former Foundation Membership [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- Surviving Spouse Membership [Doc:1#Chunk:1]

II. TRANSFER FEES & SCENARIOS:
- Foundation Transfer to Child: Transfer fee equal to Foundation Membership initiation fee plus taxes [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- Transfer to Surviving Spouse: Available for Foundation, Golfing Senior, Social, or Social Former Foundation Members [Doc:1#Chunk:1]

III. REINSTATEMENT PROVISIONS:
- Year-by-year reduction in reinstatement fees [Doc:1#Chunk:1]

IV. PAYMENT & BILLING REQUIREMENTS:
- Membership becomes active upon payment receipt [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- New Member Orientation required within two weeks of payment [Doc:1#Chunk:1]

V. SPECIAL PROGRAMS & PROVISIONS:
- Legacy Membership program available [Doc:1#Chunk:1]

This overview covers the membership fee structures, transfer scenarios, and payment requirements based on the provided source notes.
